indexer.label: CONF_MESSAGE[ElasticSearch Search Engine]
indexer.description: CONF_MESSAGE[ElasticSearch implementation to index all files and search a whole repository quickly.]

param.name: index_content
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Index Content]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Parses the file when possible and index its content (see plugin global options)]

param.name: index_meta_fields
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Index Meta Fields]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Which additionnal fields to index and search]

param.name: repository_specific_keywords
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Repository keywords]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[If your repository path is defined dynamically by specific keywords like AJXP_USER, or your own, mention them here.]

global_param.name: MAX_RESULTS
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Max results displayed]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Set the maximum results that will be displayed.]

global_param.name: PARSE_CONTENT_MAX_SIZE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Parse Content Until]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Skip content parsing and indexation for files bigger than this size (must be in Bytes)]

global_param.name: PARSE_CONTENT_HTML
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[HTML files]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[List of extensions to consider as HTML file and parse content]

global_param.name: PARSE_CONTENT_TXT
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Text files]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[List of extensions to consider as Text file and parse content]

global_param.name: UNOCONV
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Unoconv Path]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Full path on the server to the 'unoconv' binary]

global_param.name: PDFTOTEXT
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[PdftoText Path]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Full path on the server to the 'pdftotext' binary]

global_param.name: AUTO_WILDCARD
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Auto-Wildcard]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Automatically append a * after the user query to make the search broader]

global_param.name: WILDCARD_LIMITATION
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Wildcard limitation]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[For the sake of performances, it is not recommanded to use wildcard as a very first character of a query string. Lucene recommends asking the user minimum 3 characters before wildcard. Still, you can set it to 0 if necessary for your usecases.]
